genresAdvancedInfo.name: horo
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Horo is a traditional Bulgarian dance that originated in the Rhodope Mountains. The music associated with this dance is characterized by its use of irregular rhythms and complex melodies, often played on bagpipes or other folk instruments. Horo music is typically upbeat and celebratory, with a strong emphasis on community and togetherness.
